datafield.subfield: Ke ji kao gu wen ji /
English title from added title page:

" Shi yi wu " guo jia ke ji zhi cheng ji hua xiang mu " zhong hua wen ming tan yuan gong cheng ( er )" de "3500BC-1500BC zhong guo wen ming xing cheng yu zao qi fa zhan jie duan de ji shu yu jing ji yan jiu " ke ti zi zhu.
Ben shu wen wei wu bian, nei rong bao kuo: dong wu kao gu, yuan jing kao gu, ke ji kao gu, xue shu da jia yu ke ji kao gu, zuo zhe zhu shu pian mu.
In Chinese, with abstract and table of content in English.
"十一五"国家科技支撑计划项目"中华文明探源工程(二)"的"3500BC-1500BC中国文明形成与早期发展阶段的技术与经济研究"课题资助.
本书分为五编, 内容包括: 动物考古, 环境考古, 科技考古, 学术大家与科技考古, 作者著述篇目.

Chengdu Shi wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo
成都文物考古研究所 ... [et al.] ; [执笔雷玉华, 程崇勋].

datafield.subfield: Zhongguo ju luo kao gu de li lun yu shi jian.
ji nian Xinmi Xinzhai yi zhi fa jue 30 nian xue shu yan tao hui lun wen ji /
Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan kao gu yan jiu suo, Zhengzhou Shi wen wu kao gu yan jiu yuan bian.
Ji nian Xinmi Xinzhai yi zhi fa jue 30 nian xue shu yan tao hui lun wen ji

2009 nian 12 yue 28 ri zhi 30 ri, you Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan kao gu yan jiu suo, Zhengzhou Shi wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo, Xinmi Shi ren min zheng fu zhu ban de "Zhongguo ju luo kao gu de li lun yu shi jian ji ji nian Xinzhai yi zhi fa jue 30 zhou nian xue shu yan tao hui" zai Henan Xinmi Shi zhao kai. Hui yi wei rao Zhongguo ju luo kao gu yi ji Xinzhai yi zhi de you guan xue shu wen ti jing xing le tao lun, nei rong she ji xin shi qi shi dai ge zhong yao qu yu de ju luo kao gu yan jiu deng nei rong zhan kai.
Zhongguo ju luo kao gu de quan mian jian yan yu guang fan jiao liu : “Zhongguo ju luo kao gu li lun yu shi jian ji ji nian Xinzhai yi zhi fa jue 30 zhou nian xue shu yan tao hui” zong shu /

中国聚落考古的理论与实践.
纪念新密新砦遗址发掘30年学术研讨会论文集 /
中国社会科学院考古研究所, 郑州市文物考古研究院编.
纪念新密新砦遗址发掘30年学术研讨会论文集
2009年12月28日至30日, 由中国社会科学院考古研究所, 郑州市文物考古研究院, 新密市人民政府主办的"中国聚落考古的理论与实践暨纪念新砦遗址发掘30周年学术研讨会"在河南新密市召开. 会议围绕中国聚落考古以及新砦遗址的有关学术问题进行了讨论, 内容涉及新石器时代各重要区域的聚落考古研究等内容展开.
中国聚落考古的全面检验与广泛交流——“中国聚落考古的理论与实践暨纪念 新砦遗址发掘30周年学术研讨会”综述

关于文明形成的判断标准问题 /
聚落考古研究中的环境考古问题 /

datafield.subfield: 14C Ce nian ji ke ji kao gu lun ji /
Table of contents also in English.

14C(Tan-14) ce buab dui yu kao gu xue, ren lei xue, di si wei di zhi xue, di qiu hua xue, hai yang xue, huan jing xue deng xue ke de yan jiu ju you zhong yao yi yi. 14C shi zi ran jie de chan wu, ta de shuai bian bu yi lai yu ren he wai jie tiao jie, ke yi zuo jing que ce ding. Ben lun ji de liang wei zuo zhe chang nian yi lai cong shi 14 C ce nian de shi yan yu yan jiu gong zuo, cheng guo po feng. Lun ji shou lu 14 C ce nian de ji ben yuan li he shi yan ji shu de lun wen 13 pian, jie he shi qian kao gu ji qu ta ying yong kee ue xe lun wen 12 pian, you guan Xia Shang Zhou duan dai gong cheng de lun wen 13 pian, yi ji you guan qi ta ke ji kao gu de wen zhang 5 pian.

14C(碳--14)测年对于考古学, 人类学, 第四位地质学, 地球化学, 海洋学, 环境学等学科的研究具有重要意义.14C是自然界的产物, 它的衰变不依赖于任何外界条件, 可以做精确测定.本论集的两位作者长年以来从事14C测年的实验与研究工作, 成果颇丰.论集收录14C测年的基本原理和实验技术的论文13篇, 结合史前考古及其他应用科学的论文12篇, 有关夏商周断代工程的论文13篇, 以及有关其他科技考古的文章5篇.

山东省文物考古研究所出土铜镜研究
本书收集山东省文物考古研究所考古发掘出土铜镜488面。其中战国时期铜镜约30余面，西汉时期铜镜约420余面，东汉时期铜镜约30面。就铜镜的类别、时代和特征做初步探讨。从出土铜镜这样一个视角，对山东战国秦汉时期的文化与文明做新的探讨。

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: Les mathématiques de l'Égypte ancienne : numération, métrologie, arithmétique, géométrie et autres problèmes /

Les nombreux problèmes et extraits analysés relèvent du corpus mathématique de base datant du Moyen Empire, mais également de documents administratifs et de documents plus récents tels les papyri démotiques. Ce que ces textes nous enseignent dépasse parfois le cadre purement mathématique en donnant des indications sur les valeurs marchandes de produits ou services, les montants de certains salaires ou taxes, les prévisions d’un chantier, la construction d’éléments architecturaux, la gestion des récoltes et du bétail ou la fabrication de la bière.

datafield.subfield: Development of religion and thought in ancient Egypt /
James Henry Breasted ; introduction by John A. Wilson.
ISAW copy is from the Library of Hayim and Miriam Tadmor.
Nature and the State Make Their Impression on Religion --
Death Makes Its Impression on Religion (Period: earliest times to 25th century B.C.) --
The Ascent to the Sky (Period: 30th to 25th century B.C.) --
The Earliest Celestial Hereafter (Period: 30th to 25th century B.C.) --
The Osirianization of the Hereafter (Period: 30th to 25th century B.C.) --
Scepticism and the Problem of Suffering (29th century to 18th century B.C.) --
The Social Forces Make Their Impression on Religion --
The Earliest Social Regeneration (Period: 22d to 18th century B.C.) --
Popularization of the Old Royal Hereafter --
Conscience and the Book of the Dead --
Magic and Morals (Period: 22d century to 1350 B.C.) --
The World-State Makes Its Impression on Religion --
Sacerdotalism and Final Decadence (Period: 1350 B.C. on.).

"Contrary to the popular and current impression, the most important body of sacred literature in Egypt is not the Book of the Dead, but a much older literature which we now call the "Pyramid Texts." These texts, preserved in the Fifth and Sixth Dynasty Pyramids at Sakkara, form the oldest body of literature surviving from the ancient world and disclose to us the earliest chapter in the intellectual history of man as preserved to modern times. They are to the study of Egyptian language and civilization what the Vedas have been in the study of early East Indian and Aryan culture. Discovered in 1880-81, they were published by Maspero in a pioneer edition which will always remain a great achievement and a landmark in the history of Egyptology. The fact that progress has been made in the publication of such epigraphic work is no reflection upon the devoted labors of the distinguished first editor of the Pyramid Texts ... It was therefore with peculiar pleasure that just after the appearance of Sethe's edition of the Pyramid Texts I received President Francis Brown's very cordial invitation to deliver the Morse Lectures at Union Theological Seminary on some subject in Egyptian life and civilization. While it was obviously desirable at this juncture to choose a subject which would involve some account of the Pyramid Texts, it was equally desirable to assign them their proper place in the development of Egyptian civilization. This latter desideratum led to a rather more ambitious subject than the time available before the delivery of the lectures would permit to treat exhaustively, viz., to trace the development of Egyptian religion in its relation to life and thought."--Preface (p. xiii-xiv).
System requirements: World Wide Web, Pdf.

datafield.subfield: Commerce, communication, and the origins of the European economy -- PART I: THE END OF THE WORLD: The end of the ancient world -- Late Roman industry: case studies in decline -- Land and river communication in late antiquity -- Sea change in late antiquity -- The end of the ancient economy: a provisional balance sheet -- PART II: PEOPLE ON THE MOVE: A few Western faces -- Two hundred more Western envoys and pilgrims: group portrait -- Byzantine faces -- Easterners heating West; group portrait -- Traders, slaves, and exiles -- People on the move -- PART III: THINGS THAT TRAVELED: Hagiographical collecting exotic relics in early medieval France -- "Virtual" coins and communications -- Real money: Arab and Byzantine coins around Carolingian Europe -- Things that traveled -- PART IV: THE PATTERN OF CHANGE: The experience of travel -- Secular rhythm: communication over time -- Seasonal rhythms -- Time under way --"Spaces of sea": Europe's Western Mediterranean communication -- Venetian breakthrough: European communication in the central Mediterranean -- New overland routes -- The patterns of change -- PART V: COMMERCE: Early medieval trading worlds -- Where are the merchants? Italy -- Merchants and markets of Frankland -- Connections -- Whre are the wares? Eastern imports to Europe -- European exports to Africa and Asia -- At the origins of the European economy -- Appendixes: 1: Checklist of Mediterranean travelers, 700-900 -- 2: Mentions of mancosi to 850 -- 3: Catalogue of Arab and Byzantine coins in the West -- 4: A register of Mediterranean communication, 700-900.

"For fifty years debate has raged about early European commerce during the period between antiquity and the middle ages. Was there trade? If so, in what - and with whom? New evidence and new ways of looking at old evidence are now breaking the stalemate. Analysis of communications - the movements of people, ideas and things - is transforming our vision of Europe and the Mediterranean in the age of Charlemagne and Harun al Rashid. This is the first comprehensive analysis of the economic transition during this period for over sixty years. Using new materials and new methodology, it will attract all social and economic historians of antiquity and the middle ages, and anyone concerned with the origins of Europe, the history of the slave trade, medicine and disease, cross-cultural contacts, and the Muslim and Byzantine worlds."--publisher's description.

Zhongguo gu dai guo jia he she hui bian qian

Zhongguo gudai guojia he shehui bianpian
Beijing shi fan da xue chu ban she,

Ben lun wen ji gong shou ji guo nei wai you xiu lun wen liu shi pian, she ji cong shi qian wen ming dao Ming Qing shi qi de Zhongguo shi yan jiu. Cong nei rong kan, chu chuan tong de zheng zhi ji, jing ji shi, jun shi shi, she hui shi, min zu shi deng yan jiu zhi wai, huan she ji li shi di li xu, zong jiao shi shu shi, li shi wen xian xue, nai zhi li shi tu xiang xue, ke ji shi, huan jing shi xue deng zhu duo ling yu. Ben lun wen ji de zhu yao te disn ti xiang zai dui xin cai liao de xin quan shi, dui Zhongguo gu dai guo jia he she hui bian qian yan jiu zhong shi xue yan jiu xin fang fa de yong yong yi ji cong xin de yan jiu shi ye tan tao Zhongguo gu dai guo jia he she hui de bia nqian shang. Lun wen zuo zhe zai shu li li shi wen xian, mu zhi deng chuan tong shi liao de tong shi, huan shi fen zhong shi dui xin shi liao de fa jue zheng li, dui chu tu wen wu he kao gu shi wu deng xin cai liao de fen xi yun yong, bing zai ju ti yan jiu zhong shen tou le she hui shi xue, xin li shi xue, tu xiang xue deng ge zhong xin de yan jiu fang fa.
新材料, 新方法, 新视野 :
中国古代国家和社会变迁 = Xincailiao, xinfangfa, xinshiye : Zhongguo gudai guojia he shehui bianpian /
中国古代国家和社会变迁

本论文集共收集国内外优秀论文六十篇, 涉及从史前文明到明清时期的中国史研究. 从内容看,除传统的政治史, 经济史, 军事史, 社会史, 民族史等研究之外, 还涉及历史地理学, 宗教艺术史, 历史文献学, 海外关系史, 乃至历史图像学, 科技史学, 环境史学等诸多领域. 本次论文集的主要特点体现在对新材料的新诠释, 对中国古代国家和社会变迁研究中史学研究新方法的运用以及从新的研究视野探讨中国古代国家和社会的变迁上. 论文作者在梳理历史文献, 墓志等传统史料的同时, 还十分重视对新史料的发掘整理, 对出土文物和考古实物等新材料的分析运用, 并在具体研究中渗透了社会史学, 心理史学, 图像学等各种新的研究方法.

yi fo jiao shi zao xiang ji mu zang bi hua wei zhong xin /

Ben wen yi Zhongguo li shi shang Nan Bei chao shi qi bei fang Dong Wei Bei Qi (534-577nian) Fo jiao zao xiang ji mu zang bi hua zhong de wen yang zuo wei yan jiu dui xiang, you liang bu fen zu cheng: Shang bian, "Wen yang gai yao yan jiu" ; Xia bian, "Zhong dian wen yang yan jiu".
东魏北齐庄严纹样研究 :
以佛教石造像及墓葬壁画为中心 /
本文以中国历史上南北朝时期北方东魏北齐(534-577年)佛教石造像及墓葬壁画中的纹样作为研究对象，由两部分组成：上编，“纹样概要研究”；下编，“重点纹样研究”。

"敎育部人文社会科学重点硏究基地基金资助."
本书从对历史上乐籍最为集中的地域之一山西省所存乐戶后人的实地考察入手, 以乐籍制度, 乐人为主脉对中国音乐文化传统进行梳理, 并对这一群体在历史上各个时期的生存方式, 社会地位, 信仰崇拜, 组织形式, 供职机构, 多种音乐形态的演变, 进行全方位的研讨.

Title in English from added title page:
Archaeological study of the Shang period settlement and their social fundations
Zhongguo gu dai wen ming yu kao gu xue yan jiu cong shu ;

Ben shu dui Shang dai de ju luo deng ji jin xing le hua fen, fen xi le bu tong deng ji ju luo de ju ti xing tai ji qi suo yun han de she hui gong neng, tong shi, dui ji qi suo fan ying de she hui sheng shuo xing tai, ji ceng she hui zu zhi xing shi, dui Shang wang chao dui wai kuo zhang guo chen deng wen ti jin xing le chong fen lun zheng.
商代聚落体系及其社会功能研究 /
中国古代文明与考古学研究丛书 ;
本书对商代的聚落等级进行了划分, 分析了不同等级聚落的具体形态及其所蕴含的社会功能, 同时, 对及其所反映的社会生活形态, 基层社会组织形式, 对商王朝对外扩张过程等问题进行了充分论证.
"Zhongguo gu dai wen ming yu kao gu xue" yan jiu cong shu

datafield.subfield: from Alexander the Great to Cleopatra /
edited by Roberta Casagrande-Kim ; with contributions by Mary C. Greul, Roger S. Bagnall, Dee L. Clayman, Roberta Casagrande-Kim, and Olaf E. Kaper.
Institute for the Study of the Ancient World at New York University,

Catalog of an exhibition held at the Institute for the Study of the Ancient World at New York University, October 8, 2014-January 4, 2015 and the Art Institute of Chicago, October 31, 2013-July 27, 2014.

The catalogue examines the interactions between Greek and Egyptian cultures during the nearly three hundred year period when Egypt was under Greek rule. It reveals how Egypt's Ptolemaic rulers used longstanding cultural traditions as a means of asserting power and promoting loyalty among the conquered population. It also looks at the intense familial intrigue and jockeying for position that characterized the Ptolemies.
Institute for the Study of the Ancient World

新华书店北京发行所发行,
本书从吉林大学历史学文物展列室现有1210枚印章中精选而成. 印章均附以原大照片，有背款及边款的均附有拓本，各按时代，类别，编次，并编序号，以便查检研究.

datafield.subfield: Gu dai du cheng yu di ling kao gu yan jiu /
Archaeological study of forbidden cities and mausoleum in ancient China
Added title page, table of contents and abstract in English.

Ben shu wei zuo zhe zai Qin Han du cheng he di ling kao gu yan jiu fang mian de lun wen, yi xie xin de guan dian ru Qin Xianyang cheng fan wei yu bu ju, Xi Han di ling ling yuan, qin yuan bu ju xing cheng, Han Chang'an Cheng ji qi Wei yang gong de bu ju jiegou deng tian bu gai ling yu de yan jiu kong bai, ben lun wen ji dui du cheng yi zhi, gu dai wa dang kao gu yan jiu de yi xie fang fa he li lun wen ti, xiang guan lun wen ye jin xing le ren zhen de tan suo.
古代都城与帝陵考古硏究 /
本书为作者在秦汉都城和帝陵考古研究方面的论文，一些新的观点如秦咸阳城范围与布局，西汉帝陵陵园，寝园布局形成，汉长安城及其的布局结构等填补该领域的研究空白，本论文集对都城遗址，古代瓦当考古研究的一些方法和理论问题，相关论文也进行了认真的探索.

Qing hua da xue chu ban she,

Ben shu cong gu dai tian wen xue, wen hua di li yu shan chuan mo shi, li wen hua yu zhi du, qi wu yu kong jian kao gu, chuan tong hui hua, kan yu li lun deng duo jiao du, zong he xi tong de tan tao le Zhongguo gu dai kong jian wen hua de zhu yao yuan liu, gai nian, nei han, xian xiang, te zheng yu gui lu, dui yi xie zhong yao de li lun wen ti bo jian chou si, chong fen lun zheng ti chu le quan xin de jian jie. Biao da le Zhang jiao shou xing cheng Zhongguo gu dai jian zhu kong jian de wen hua yuan tou, zhun ce yi ji nei zai luo ji de si kao, zai yan jiu shi jiao he lun zheng fang fa fang mian po wei xin yim, qi zhong ti chu le xu duo tu po xing de jian jie.
Preface, table of contents and postscript also in English.
中国古代空间文化溯源 =
The cultural gene of ancient Chinese space /
本书从古代天文学,文化地理与山川模式,礼文化与制度,器物与空间考古,传统绘画,堪舆理论等多角度,综合系统地探讨了中国古代空间文化的主要源流,概念,内涵,现象,特征与规律,对一些重要的理论问题剥茧抽丝,充分论证,提出了全新的见解.表达了张教授形成中国古代建筑空间的文化源头,准则以及内在逻辑的思考,在研究视角和论证方法方面颇为新颖,其中提出了许多突破性的见解.

datafield.subfield: Zhongguo gu dai shi yan jiu dao yin /
Nanjing da xue chu ban she,
Da xue yan jiu xing ke cheng zhuan ye xi lie jiao cai. Li shi xue lei

"Zhongguo gu dai shi yan jiu dao yin" (Fan Jinmin deng bian xie) yi zhao li shi shi dai de fa zhan xian suo, yi shi dai wei xian, xuan lu hou jie lu jin xian dai yi zhi dang dai zhu ming xue zhe guan yu Zhongguo gu dai shi yan jiu de lun wen 46 pian, fan shi kai tuo le yan jiu ling yu, biao xin le yan jiu ke ti, huo zhe neng tui chen chu xin, duo suo fa fu, huo zhe fang fa ke chen, qi ren xin zhi, huo zhe han gai le mou yi fang mian, ju you yi ding de dai biao xing, jun zai xuan lu fan wei zhi nei. "Zhongguo gu dai shi yan jiu dao yin" mei zhang qian de dao lun, jian yao zong shu ge ge shi dai de fa zhan mai luo ji qi te dian, xuan wen qian de dao yan, jian lun suo xuan lun wen de yao zhi, te dian he jian zhi, xuan wen hou de yan jiu yu si kao, zhi zai yin fa xue sheng jin yi bu yan jiu, pei yang ti sheng xue sheng dui Zhongguo gu dai li shi de yan jiu neng li.
大学研究型课程专业系列教材. 历史学类

《中国古代史研究导引》(范金民等编写)依照历史时代的发展线索，以时代为限，选录或节录近现代以至当代著名学者关于中国古代史研究的论文46篇，凡是开拓了研究领域，标新了研究课题，或者能够推陈出新，多所发覆，或者方法可称，启人心智，或者涵盖了某一方面，具有一定的代表性，均在选录范围之内。《中国古代史研究导引》每章前的导论，简要综述各个时代的发展脉络及其特点，选文前的导言，简论所选论文的要旨、特点与价值，选文后的研究与思考，旨在引发学生进一步探究，培养并提升学生对于中国古代历史的研究能力.

datafield.subfield: Han Wei fa lü yu she hui :
yi jian du, wen shu wei zhong xin de kao cha /
Yi jian du, wen shu wei zhong xin de kao cha
She hui ke xue wen xian chu ban she,
Zhongguo ren min da xue Han Tang yan jiu cong shu

Ben shu yi xin chu jian du, wen shu wei zhong xin, yi zheng fu, min jian hu dong wei shi jiao, dui Han Wei shi qi fa lu, she hui ling yu fa sheng de zhong da bian hua jin xing le shen ru de tan tao. Tong guo ben shu xi zhi dee kao zheng, you guan Qin Han xing ming, xing fa ji bie gou cheng deng jiu wen ti de dao de xin de jie shi, Wei Jin fa lu ti li de xuan xue hua, Han Tang hu zhu cheng wei, shen fen yi ji hu ji fen he, tong ju gai nian de bian qian deng xue jie wei ceng cuo yi de xin wen ti de dao ji shi. Zai ci ji chu shang, dui xue jie shi wei ding xian de "Fa lu Ru jia hua" xue shuo ti chu le zhi yi, wei jin yi bu ren shi Zhongguo gu dai fa lu he she hui de bian qian ti gong le xin de shi jiao.
以简牍, 文书为中心的考察 /
以简牍, 文书为中心的考察
中国人民大学汉唐研究丛书

本书以新出简牍, 文书为中心, 以政府, 民间互动为视角, 对汉魏时期法律, 社会领域发生的重大变化进行了深入的探讨. 通过本书细致的考证, 有关秦汉刑名, 刑罚级别构成等旧问题得到新的解释, 魏晋法律体例的玄学化, 汉唐戶主称谓, 身份以及戶籍分合, 同居概念的变迁等学界未曾措意的新问题得到揭示. 在此基础上, 对学界视为定谳的 "法律儒家化" 学说提出了质疑, 为进一步认识中国古代法律和社会的变迁提供了新的视角.

Sarah J. Clackson et Alain Delattre.
The work describes a corpus of papyri discovered at the Monastery of Bawit between 1901 and 1905 by Jean Clédat. The papyri are now held by the Louvre Museum.

Etude d'un lot de papyrus provenant des fouilles de l'archéologue Jean Clédat sur le site du monastère de Baouît. Chaque document est traduit et commenté, mettant ainsi en lumière l'organisation et l'économie du monastère.
Monastery of Apollo at Bawit (Bawit, Egypt)
Institut français d'archéologie orientale du Caire,

datafield.subfield: Zhu zi yan jiu cong shu

Ben shu zai lue lun Guang zhong "Guan Zi" de ji chu shang, dui Song yi qian de Guan Zi yan jiu jin xing le shu li he tan tao, gou hua chu zai zhe yi shi qi, Guan Zi yan jiu de li shi gui ji. Nei rong bao kuo xian Qin Guan Zhong si xiang ping shuo, "Guan Zi" yan jiu zai Han dai de bo xing, "Guan Zi' yan jiu zai San Guo Liang Jin Nan Bei Chao de fa zhan yu chen ji, "Guan Zi" yan jiu zai Tang dai de zai xing, "Guan Zi" yan jiu zai Song dai de fan rong deng.
本书在略论管仲与《管子》的基础上, 对宋以前的管子研究进行了梳理和探讨, 勾画出在这一时期, 管子研究的历史轨迹. 内容包括先秦管仲思想评说, "管子"研究在汉代的勃兴, "管子"研究在三国两晋南北朝的发展与沉寂, "管子"研究在唐代的再兴, "管子"研究在宋代的繁荣等.
Zhu zi yan jiu cong shu.

datafield.subfield: Administration, société et pouvoir à Thèbes sous la XXIIe dynastie bubastite /

"This work ... proposes a socio-political history of Egypt during the Libyan Period (XXIInd Dynasty, c. 943-730 BC) through an intensive case study of the city of Thebes. The study presents a chronological analysis of this often disturbed period and includes prosopographical research on local families and an administrative history using titles of state officials. The study of the complex relationships maintained by the royal powers within Theban society, and the analysis of the structures of this society in the light of the anthropology, highlight the originality of this period and the continuity of the royal and state traditions in the Egyptian History of the First Millennium BC."--Back cover.
Publications de l'Institut français d'archéologie orientale du Caire ;

北京科技大学冶金与材料史研究所，北京科技大学科学技术与文明研究中心编.
本书收录了北京科技大学冶金与材料史研究所和科学技术与文明研究中心师生与全国各地的合作者在2006-2011年发表的有关冶金史的研究论文及鉴定报告，共计41篇，大致分综合性研究、古代铜器的科学研究、古代钢铁技术研究、古代矿冶遗址考察与分析、金属工艺技术研究、文献考证及其他六个部分。

datafield.subfield: description des vestiges pharaoniques et des traditions associées depuis Hérodote jusqu'à l'expédition d'Egypte /
Essam Salah el-Banna, avec la collaboration de Stéphane Pasquali.

Ce recueil de témoignages de voyageurs, pèlerins, géographes et historiens grecs, romains, juifs, chrétiens d'Orient et d'Occident, depuis le VIe siècle avant J.-C. jusqu'à l'expédition de Napoléon Bonaparte, offre des visions de la ville d'Héliopolis. La retranscription des textes et leur étude éclairent l'histoire réelle et légendaire du site et décrivent ses lieux remarquables.
Recherches d'archéologie, de philologie et d'histoire ;

datafield.subfield: Le naos de Sopdou à Saft el-Henneh (CG 70021) :

"The present work examines the form and function of hieroglyphic signs on the naos of Sopdu from Saft el-Henneh, now in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. This monument, dating to the 30th Dynasty and inscribed on all four sides, is of considerable epigraphic interest, as there are few similarly long inscriptions from that period. The plates show almost 1,500 signs that have been drawn especially to accompany this publication. These are grouped into 443 categories which are described in the usual format of the collection Paléographie hiéroglyphique: identification of the sign, palaeographical description with particular reference to parallels on contemporary monuments, and function. This volume on the naos of Sopdu is likewise of interest for anyone involved in the study of Egyptian art and religion in the Late Period." -- back cover.

中国科学技术与文明研究丛书
本论文集包括综述、铜器、矿冶遗址、铁器等方面的技术研究，对出土金属文物及冶金遗物进行检测与技术分析，阐述并揭示冶金技术在中华文明发展进程中的重要作用。

datafield.subfield: Bei chao jia ting xing tai yan jiu /
Gai cheng guo de dao "Jilin da xue '985' gong cheng xiang mu--Zhongguo bian jiang shi di zhe xue she hui ke xue chuang xin ji di" zi zhu.

Jia ting shi she hui sheng huo de ji ben dan wei, ben wen zhu yao jie jian she hui xue shang de gai nian he li lun, dui Bei chao de jia ting jin xing le duo fang mian de kao cha. Shou xian hua fen le dang shi jia ting de ji ben lei xing, bing xi tong lun shu le ying xiang Bei chao jia ting gui mo jie gou de zhu zhong yin su. Qi ci dui jia ting cheng yuan di wei yu yi wu jin xing le chan shu, zhi chu Hu, Han jia ting cun zai de zhong zhong cha bie. Ji er tan tao le ji li zai ru yang, shou yang, guo ji den ji chu shang de yi zhi qin shu guan xi yi ji ta men zhi jian de quan li he yi wu. Zai ci ji chu shang, cong xing zheng fa he xing fa liang ge jiao gu, dui qin shu guan xi zai fa lu shang chan sheng de xiao li yu yi chan shu. Ren wei zhe zhong xiao li bu jin ji yu yi hun yin xue yuan guan xi zi ran chan sheng de qi shu, yi she ji ni zhi de xue qin, dan yi wu fu nei de fu xi zong qin wei zhu. Zui hou, cong jia qing gong neng zhuo yan, dui Bei chao shi qi ge ge jie ceng jia ting de shou zhi yu guan li, zong jiao xin yang qing kuang he jia ting jiao yu fen bie jin xing kao cha, jie shi zai bu tong jie ji, jie ceng, min zu, zhong zu zhi jian cun zai de xi wei cha bie, yi bian cong ge ge jiao du zhan shi Bei chao jia ting de zheng ti mian mao.
该成果得到"吉林大学'985'工程项目--中国边疆史地哲学社会科学创新基地”资助。

家庭是社会生活的基本单位，本文主要借鉴社会学上的概念和理论，对北朝时期的家庭进行了多方面的考察。首先划分了当时家庭的基本类型，并系统论述了影响北朝家庭规模结构的诸种因素。其次对家庭成员的地位与义务进行了阐述，指出胡、汉家庭存在的种种差别。继而探讨了建立在乳养、收养、过继等基础上的拟制亲属关系以及他们之间的权利和义务。在此基础上，从行政法和刑法两个角度，对亲属关系在法律上产生的效力予以阐释。认为这种效力不仅及于依婚姻血缘关系自然产生的亲属，也涉及拟制的血亲，但以五服内的父系宗亲为主。最后，从家庭功能着眼，对北朝时期各个阶层家庭的收支与管理，宗教信仰情况和家庭教育分别进行考察，揭示在不同阶级、阶层，民族、种族之间存在的细微差别，以便从各个角度展示北朝家庭的整体面貌。

中国古代文明与国家起源学术研讨会
中国古代文明与国家起源学术研讨会论文集 :
沈长云, 张翠莲主编.
燕赵文化研究系列丛书
本书是2009年4月由河北师范大学, 中国社科院文明研究中心和中国先秦史学会在河北易县清西陵召开的"中国古代国家与文明起源"学术研讨会的论文集, 收录论文35篇, 涉及先秦历史和考古学等多个方面. 论文集有三个特点 : (1) 资料新, 本书收录了考古学界最新的发掘成果 ; (2) 观点新,所有文章都是初次发表 ; (3) 作者来自一流大专院校和科研院长, 阵容庞大.

datafield.subfield: Life, death and afterlife in ancient Egypt :
the Djehutymose coffin in the Kelsey Museum of Archaeology /

The elaborately decorated coffin of Djehutymose, a priest of the ancient Egyptian god Horus from around 625-580 BC, is one of the central artifacts of the Kelsey Museum of Archaeology's Egyptian collection. Using the images and texts from the coffin along with related artifacts in the Kelsey Museum, Egyptologist T. G. Wilfong explores what the coffin tells us about ancient Egyptian ideas of life, death, and the afterlife.
Kelsey Museum of Ancient and Medieval Archaeology

datafield.subfield: Jin chao fa zhi yan jiu /
He bei da xue li shi xue cong shu ;

Jiao yu bu sheng shu gao xiao ren wen she hui ke xue zhong dian yan jiu ji di he bei da xue song shi yan jiu zhong xin yu he bei da xue li shi xue qiang shi te se xue ke chu ban ji jin zi zhu chu ban.

Ben shu cong Han Wei fa lü ti xi te zheng yi ji Jin chao fa lü wen ben wan shan zui ming, xing fa ti xi, si fa zhi du deng fang mian xi tong kao cha Jin chao de yuan yuan yu liu bian, jin er jiang Jin chao fa lu dui Zhongguo gu dai fa zhi ti xi de ying xiang yu li shi di wei ti gao, zai xue shu jie guan yu ru fa rong he de ji chu shang huan bu chon le ru fa chong tu de yi mian, quan mian shen ru de ren shi le Jin chao fa lü ru jia hua de jin cheng.
教育部省属高校人文社会科学重点研究基地河北大学宋史研究中心与河北大学历史学强势特色学科出版基金资助出版.
本书从汉魏法律体系特征以及晋朝法律文本完善, 罪名, 刑罚体系, 司法制度等方面系统考察晋朝法制的渊源与流变, 进而将晋朝法律对中国古代法制体系的影响与历史地位提高, 在学术界关于儒法融合的基础上还补充了儒法冲突的一面, 全面深入地认识了晋朝法律儒家化的进程.
He bei da xue li shi xue cong shu ;

datafield.subfield: Xian qin huo bi di li yan jiu /

Ben shu wei rao xian Qin hui bi di ming kao shi, huo bi di ming yu li shi zi ran di li, li shi cheng shi di li, li shi jing ji di li, li shi zheng zhi di li yan jiu de xiang hu guan xi, di li huan jing yu xian Qin huo bi de liu tong, xian Qin huo bi yu jiao tong dao lu de fu yuan, xian Qin huo bi yu gu dai jun xian zhi du, xian Qin huo bi liu tong qu yu de kong jian te zheng yu kong jian cha yi deng huo be di li wen ti zuo la yan jiu.
本书围绕先秦货币地名考释, 货币地名与历史自然地理, 历史城市地理, 历史经济地理, 历史政治地理研究的相互关系, 地理环境与先秦货币的流通, 先秦货币与交通道路的复原, 先秦货币与古代郡县制度, 先秦货币流通区域的空间特征与空间差异等货币地理问题做了研究.

Han dai cheng shi he ju luo kao gu yu Han wen hua /
Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan kao gu yan jiu suo, Henan Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo bian.

Ben lun wen ji shai xuan can hui xue zhe lun wen zhong de 43 pian he xiang guan jiang hua, hui yi ji yao jie ji chu ban, nei rong bao kuo Han dai cheng shi he ju luo de kao gu fa xian yu yan jiu, Han dai mu zang he yi wu de kao gu fa xian yu yan jiu, Han dai wen hua jiao liu yan jiu deng fang mian. Zhe xie yan jiu nei rong guang fan, fan ying le dang qian guan yu Han dai cheng shi he ju luo kao gu, Han dai she hui li shi wen hua yan jiu de xin dong xiang, xin jin zhan he xin cheng guo.

本论文集筛选参会学者论文中的43篇和相关讲话, 会议纪要结集出版, 内容包括汉代城市和聚落的考古发现与研究, 汉代墓葬和遗物的考古发现与研究, 汉代文化交流研究等方面.这些研究内容广泛, 反映了当前关于汉代城市和聚落考古, 汉代社会历史文化研究的新动向, 新进展和新成果.

新疆石器时代与青铜时代 /
王仁湘，丛德新主编 ; 中国社会科学院边疆考古研究中心编.
中国边疆民族考古文库
本文集收录的二十余篇研究论文，涉及对新疆地区史前各阶段考古学文化的命名及认识、区域考古学文化研究，也涉及细石器、陶器、青铜器制作及冶铜业的发展阶段研究，以及人类学、生态环境等方面的研究，是对新疆地区史前时期历史画卷的多方位、多角度的描述。
建国以来新疆考古的主要收获 /
关于新疆石器时代文化的新认识 /
新疆地区青铜时代考古文化试析 /

论新疆史前考古文化的发展阶段 /

2010中国历史地理国际学术研讨会论文集 /
2010中国历史地理国际学术研讨会论文集
二〇一〇中国历史地理国际学术研讨会论文集
书中共收论文61篇, 围绕着广西历史地理, 历史政区, 政治地理, 生态环境变迁, 历史经济地理, 历史文化地理, 考古新发现与历史地理学等主题展开.
